entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of snow in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
